body.name: Chair Desk with Storage Bin - Ideal for Arts & Crafts, Snack Time, Homeschooling, Homework & More - Greenguard Gold Certified, Peppa Pig
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 18 mins
features: RECOMMENDED USE: Recommended for ages 3+; Holds up to 50 lbs.
FOR PEPPA FANS: This fun chair desk features colorful graphics of Peppa Pig characters; Ideal for homeschooling or remote learning
KID-FRIENDLY DESIGN: Desk sits low to the ground for easy access; SIZE: Assembled dimensions: 20.47"L x 22.83"W x 23.23"H
TONS OF STORAGE: Desk features pull out storage bin under the seat that provides ample space for toys, art supplies and more; Built-in cup holder is ideal for art supplies
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Made of engineered wood and fabric built to withstand years of use; Scratch-resistant finish protects the colorful graphics; Wipes clean easily with dry cloth
body.description: This Peppa Pig chair desk with storage bin by Delta Children offers kids the perfect spot for snack time, crafts, playtime or homework. This smart and sturdy chair with colorful graphics of Peppa, Rebecca rabbit and Suzy sheep also features a built-in cup holder to hold markers and a fabric storage bin underneath for additional art supplies or toys. Perfectly sized, this durable chair and desk combo has a large work surface and low height that makes it easy for preschool kids and toddlers to get in and out on their own. About Peppa Pig: Peppa is a lovable, cheeky little Pig that lives with Mummy, daddy, and little brother George. Pippa's favorite things include her family, friends and fun learning. Her adventures always end happily with loud snorts of laughter. Each Episode features fun, everyday activities that support kids' Social & emotional development. To complete your child's room, explore Delta Children Complete collection of Peppa Pig furniture based on the beloved show.

Built-in storage in the center of the table provides plenty of space to store markers, crayons, etc Your child will love this bed that features his or her favorite characters on the headboard and footboard. The storage solution of your dreams, these Multi-Bin Toy Organizers from Delta Children are the perfect addition to any playroom or bedroom Create a space for crafts, snack time, tea parties and more with a play table and chair set that is the perfect size for your child

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was the cutest purchase for my 2 year old. Loved the ease of assembly, very sturdy and good size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is 7, only 46lbs. She wanted this bad for the living room. Actually fits her great. Easy assembly and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So easy to put together, way bigger than I expected and very pretty and nice. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our granddaughter so she could use it to eat since she’s outgrowing her high chair. We weren’t expecting too much because of the price but we’re happily surprised when we opened the box. This chair is so well made and she will definitely be using this desk for years to come. And she loves loves loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughters (ages 3 and 4) LOVE these!
reviews.reviewText: This (and a similar one from another seller) was a gift for granddaughters; Irish twins whose birthdays fall very close to one another. They really love them! They have older siblings in school, and now they feel like they are students too. The desks have pride of place in a corner of the family room, and I've seen the girls go over to their desks and pull something out of the storage box beneath the chair, as if they had important work to get to! And for two very active (rowdy) girls, they understand that they cannot sit on the desk top, which would be at risk if too much weight were placed on it - and they respect that. Seeing them treat the desks as well as they do shows they like them.Regarding assembly - anyone who's a bit handy can accomplish it. There were a few extra screws in case something got lost, but I didn't need them, so they'll sit in the junk drawer for a decade or two and then get tossed. Instructions and illustrations were clear. The basket that sits beneath the seat is not robust, but as long as it's used as intended I don't see it getting clobbered right away. I had the inspiration to give the girls a bunch of my old office supplies: pads of paper, colored pencils, post-it pads, as well as some pipe cleaners and a few badge lanyards from my employer that were sitting around. Overall - highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Granddaughter loves this desk so much. Super cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little desk
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy construction looks great when put together but the instructions were terrible.No narrative only limited pictures provided.The pieces were not marked A-B-C etc. to identify which letter they corresponded to in the instructions.The worst part was that the picture sides were not identified as to top or bottom or right or left side outside ,inside .Even this small detail would have helped .Manufacturer please consider adding a narrative to these instructions!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge deskgreat value
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my granddaughter 2 1/2yro and she loves it! Instructions were not great but I was able to figure out. This desk is huge, sturdy and Great for the value! It's very easy to clean and love the added drawer underneath. The only complaint is there's nothing that keeps the drawer from being pushed all the way out the back of the desk unless it's up against a wall. Highly recommend great desk for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can see people having problems assembling this item.
The chair was chipped and falling apart on one place from under the table and had a stain in another place. Would have returned but my toddler saw it and did not let us wrap it back to return.
I paid a lot of money for this item and it is not complete there is no canvas drawerno cup and covered in scratches so won't buy again

reviews.reviewTitle: Mes enfants adorent leurs chaise de bureau.👍
reviews.reviewText: Très rigide ,très beau et c’est assez grand ! Je suis agréablement surprise parfait pour les enfants de 3 ans (même moins) a environ 8-9 ans. (Voir plus vieux même)

It’s small in scale but good enough for my 2yr old daughter now. I fear she will outgrow it by the end of this year sadly. Read other reviews it’s good up to 5-7 year olds as well? I hope so in our case. I wish there was a George pig version, I would but that one as well!
